attributes.action: Stop Charities advertising on Childrens TV Channels (i.e cartoon network, nicktoons etc)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are there charity adverts on childrens tv channels.  Children shouldnt be forced to view other people suffering, and then asked to supply cash to help.

please help to stop these adverts being shown on childrens tv channels, like Nick (toons, jnr etc), cartoon network, and many others.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/KidsTVLimits/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
